resources:
QuizAttempt "Which of the following behaviors qualifies as a form of abuse?" a. Using online communities or cell phones to control, intimidate, or humiliate you b. Making you feel guilty or immature when you don’t consent to sexual activity c. Accusing you of cheating and often being jealous of your outside relationships d. All of the above Which of the following behaviors could be a form of positive consent? a. Assuming permission to engage in a sexual act with someone because you two have done it in the past b. Using physical cues to let somebody know you would be comfortable taking things to the next level c. Believing that a lack of a verbal refusal is an invitation to continue d. Interpretation of kissing, flirting, or certain types of clothing (or lack thereof) as an invitation for anything more All except which of the following are positive ways to support someone who has been sexually assaulted? a. Offering to be there when the survivor decides to seek medical attention or plans to report their assault b. Encouraging them to practice good self-care during this difficult time c. Listening and communicating without judgement d. Pressuring them to engage in activities they aren’t ready to do yet

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Quod ea non occurrentia fingunt, vincunt Aristonem; Quid me istud rogas? Quid igitur, inquit, eos responsuros putas? Quonam modo? Octavio fuit, cum illam severitatem in eo filio adhibuit, quem in adoptionem D. Duo Reges: constructio interrete.
Quae quidem sapientes sequuntur duce natura tamquam videntes; Prioris generis est docilitas, memoria; Atque hoc loco similitudines eas, quibus illi uti solent, dissimillimas proferebas. Sed ne, dum huic obsequor, vobis molestus sim. Cur igitur easdem res, inquam, Peripateticis dicentibus verbum nullum est, quod non intellegatur? An eum discere ea mavis, quae cum plane perdidiceriti nihil sciat? Atque haec coniunctio confusioque virtutum tamen a philosophis ratione quadam distinguitur. At iam decimum annum in spelunca iacet.
Quae animi affectio suum cuique tribuens atque hanc, quam dico. Quid enim? Primum divisit ineleganter; Et quidem Arcesilas tuus, etsi fuit in disserendo pertinacior, tamen noster fuit; Pisone in eo gymnasio, quod Ptolomaeum vocatur, unaque nobiscum Q. Sed plane dicit quod intellegit. Ut nemo dubitet, eorum omnia officia quo spectare, quid sequi, quid fugere debeant? Hoc etsi multimodis reprehendi potest, tamen accipio, quod dant. Apparet statim, quae sint officia, quae actiones. Etsi ea quidem, quae adhuc dixisti, quamvis ad aetatem recte isto modo dicerentur.
Sed tamen intellego quid velit. Si quicquam extra virtutem habeatur in bonis. Huius ego nunc auctoritatem sequens idem faciam. Sed tamen intellego quid velit. Ergo hoc quidem apparet, nos ad agendum esse natos. Quos quidem tibi studiose et diligenter tractandos magnopere censeo. Quid est, quod ab ea absolvi et perfici debeat? In qua quid est boni praeter summam voluptatem, et eam sempiternam?
Omnis enim est natura diligens sui. At ille pellit, qui permulcet sensum voluptate. Cur tantas regiones barbarorum pedibus obiit, tot maria transmisit? Omnes enim iucundum motum, quo sensus hilaretur. Nam et complectitur verbis, quod vult, et dicit plane, quod intellegam;
